39 class SurfaceChannelOrder {
40  public:
41  SurfaceChannelOrder() : mCode( UNSPECIFIED ), mRed( INVALID ), mGreen( INVALID ), mBlue( INVALID ), mAlpha( INVALID ), mPixelInc( INVALID ) {}
42  SurfaceChannelOrder( int aCode );
43  SurfaceChannelOrder( const SurfaceChannelOrder &aOrder );
44 
45 // static ChannelOrder GetPlatformNativeChannelOrder( bool includeAlpha );
46 
47  uint8_t getRedOffset() const { return mRed; }
48  uint8_t getGreenOffset() const { return mGreen; }
49  uint8_t getBlueOffset() const { return mBlue; }
50  uint8_t getAlphaOffset() const { return mAlpha; }
51  bool hasAlpha() const { return ( mAlpha != INVALID ) ? true : false; }
52  uint8_t getPixelInc() const { return mPixelInc; }
53  int getCode() const { return mCode; }
54 
55  bool operator==( const SurfaceChannelOrder& sco ) const
56  {
57  return mCode == sco.mCode;
58  }
59 
60  enum { CHAN_RED, CHAN_GREEN, CHAN_BLUE, CHAN_ALPHA, INVALID = 255 };
61  enum { RGBA, BGRA, ARGB, ABGR, RGBX, BGRX, XRGB, XBGR, RGB, BGR, UNSPECIFIED }; // Codes
62 
63  int getImageIoChannelOrder() const;
64 
65  private:
66  void set( uint8_t aRed, uint8_t aGreen, uint8_t aBlue, uint8_t aAlpha, uint8_t aPixelInc );
67  int mCode; // the enum
68  uint8_t mRed, mGreen, mBlue, mAlpha, mPixelInc;
69 
70 };
71 
73 class SurfaceConstraints {
74  public:
75  virtual ~SurfaceConstraints() {}
76 
77  virtual SurfaceChannelOrder getChannelOrder( bool alpha ) const { return ( alpha ) ? SurfaceChannelOrder::RGBA : SurfaceChannelOrder::RGB; }
78  virtual int32_t getRowBytes( int requestedWidth, const SurfaceChannelOrder &sco, int elementSize ) const { return requestedWidth * elementSize * sco.getPixelInc(); }
79 };
80 
81 class SurfaceConstraintsDefault : public SurfaceConstraints {
82 };

87 template<typename T>
89 class SurfaceT {
90  private:
92  struct Obj {
93  Obj( int32_t aWidth, int32_t aHeight, SurfaceChannelOrder aChannelOrder, T *aData, bool aOwnsData, int32_t aRowBytes );
94  ~Obj();
95 
96  void initChannels();
97  void setChannelOrder( const SurfaceChannelOrder &aChannelOrder );
98  void setDeallocator( void(*aDeallocatorFunc)( void * ), void *aDeallocatorRefcon );
99 
100  int32_t mWidth, mHeight, mRowBytes;
101  bool mIsPremultiplied;
102  T *mData;
103  bool mOwnsData;
104  SurfaceChannelOrder mChannelOrder;
105  ChannelT<T> mChannels[4];
106 
107  void (*mDeallocatorFunc)(void *refcon);
108  void *mDeallocatorRefcon;
109  };
111 
112  public:
114  SurfaceT() {}
120  SurfaceT( int32_t width, int32_t height, bool alpha, SurfaceChannelOrder channelOrder = SurfaceChannelOrder::UNSPECIFIED );
121  SurfaceT( int32_t width, int32_t height, bool alpha, const SurfaceConstraints &constraints );

135  int32_t getWidth() const { return mObj->mWidth; }
137  int32_t getHeight() const { return mObj->mHeight; }
139  Vec2i getSize() const { return Vec2i( mObj->mWidth, mObj->mHeight ); }
141  float getAspectRatio() const { return mObj->mWidth / (float)mObj->mHeight; }
143  Area getBounds() const { return Area( 0, 0, mObj->mWidth, mObj->mHeight ); }
145  bool hasAlpha() const { return mObj->mChannelOrder.hasAlpha(); }
147  bool isPremultiplied() const { return mObj->mIsPremultiplied; }
149  bool setPremultiplied( bool premult = true ) const { return mObj->mIsPremultiplied = premult; }

161  T* getData() { return mObj->mData; }
162  const T* getData() const { return mObj->mData; }
163  T* getData( const Vec2i &offset ) { return reinterpret_cast<T*>( reinterpret_cast<unsigned char*>( mObj->mData + offset.x * getPixelInc() ) + offset.y * mObj->mRowBytes ); }
164  const T* getData( const Vec2i &offset ) const { return reinterpret_cast<T*>( reinterpret_cast<unsigned char*>( mObj->mData + offset.x * getPixelInc() ) + offset.y * mObj->mRowBytes ); }
166  T* getDataRed( const Vec2i &offset ) { return getData( offset ) + getRedOffset(); }
167  const T* getDataRed( const Vec2i &offset ) const { return getData( offset ) + getRedOffset(); }
169  T* getDataGreen( const Vec2i &offset ) { return getData( offset ) + getGreenOffset(); }
170  const T* getDataGreen( const Vec2i &offset ) const { return getData( offset ) + getGreenOffset(); }
172  T* getDataBlue( const Vec2i &offset ) { return getData( offset ) + getBlueOffset(); }
173  const T* getDataBlue( const Vec2i &offset ) const { return getData( offset ) + getBlueOffset(); }
175  T* getDataAlpha( const Vec2i &offset ) { return getData( offset ) + getAlphaOffset(); }

200  ChannelT<T>& getChannelRed() { return mObj->mChannels[SurfaceChannelOrder::CHAN_RED]; }

216 
218  ColorAT<T> getPixel( Vec2i pos ) const { pos.x = constrain<int32_t>( pos.x, 0, mObj->mWidth - 1); pos.y = constrain<int32_t>( pos.y, 0, mObj->mHeight - 1 ); const T *p = getData( pos ); return ColorAT<T>( p[getRedOffset()], p[getGreenOffset()], p[getBlueOffset()], ( hasAlpha() ) ? p[getAlphaOffset()] : CHANTRAIT<T>::max() ); }
220  void setPixel( Vec2i pos, const ColorT<T> &c ) { pos.x = constrain<int32_t>( pos.x, 0, mObj->mWidth - 1); pos.y = constrain<int32_t>( pos.y, 0, mObj->mHeight - 1 ); T *p = getData( pos ); p[getRedOffset()] = c.r; p[getGreenOffset()] = c.g; p[getBlueOffset()] = c.b; }
222  void setPixel( Vec2i pos, const ColorAT<T> &c ) { pos.x = constrain<int32_t>( pos.x, 0, mObj->mWidth - 1); pos.y = constrain<int32_t>( pos.y, 0, mObj->mHeight - 1 ); T *p = getData( pos ); p[getRedOffset()] = c.r; p[getGreenOffset()] = c.g; p[getBlueOffset()] = c.b; if( hasAlpha() ) p[getAlphaOffset()] = c.a; }

247 
249  class Iter {
250  public:
251  Iter( SurfaceT<T> &SurfaceT, const Area &area )
252  : mRedOff( SurfaceT.getRedOffset() ), mGreenOff( SurfaceT.getGreenOffset() ),
253  mBlueOff( SurfaceT.getBlueOffset() ), mAlphaOff( SurfaceT.getAlphaOffset() ),
254  mInc( SurfaceT.getPixelInc() ), mRowInc( SurfaceT.getRowBytes() )
255  {
256  Area clippedArea( area.getClipBy( SurfaceT.getBounds() ) );
257  mWidth = clippedArea.getWidth();
258  mHeight = clippedArea.getHeight();
259  mLinePtr = reinterpret_cast<uint8_t*>( SurfaceT.getData( clippedArea.getUL() ) );
260  mPtr = reinterpret_cast<T*>( mLinePtr );
261  mStartX = mX = clippedArea.getX1();
262  mStartY = mY = clippedArea.getY1();
263  mEndX = clippedArea.getX2();
264  mEndY = clippedArea.getY2();
265  // in order to be at the right place after an initial call to line(), we need to back up one line
266  mY = clippedArea.getY1() - 1;
267  mLinePtr -= mRowInc;
268  }
270  T& r() const { return mPtr[mRedOff]; }
272  T& g() const { return mPtr[mGreenOff]; }
274  T& b() const { return mPtr[mBlueOff]; }
276  T& a() const { return mPtr[mAlphaOff]; }
277 
279  T& r( int32_t xOff, int32_t yOff ) const { return mPtr[mRedOff + xOff * mInc + yOff * mRowInc]; }
281  T& g( int32_t xOff, int32_t yOff ) const { return mPtr[mGreenOff + xOff * mInc + yOff * mRowInc]; }
283  T& b( int32_t xOff, int32_t yOff ) const { return mPtr[mBlueOff + xOff * mInc + yOff * mRowInc]; }
285  T& a( int32_t xOff, int32_t yOff ) const { return mPtr[mAlphaOff + xOff * mInc + yOff * mRowInc]; }
286 
288  T& rClamped( int32_t xOff, int32_t yOff ) const
289  { xOff = std::min(std::max(mX + xOff, mStartX),mEndX - 1) - mX; yOff = std::min(std::max( mY + yOff, mStartY ), mEndY - 1) - mY;
290  return *(T*)((uint8_t*)( mPtr + mRedOff + xOff * mInc ) + yOff * mRowInc); }
292  T& gClamped( int32_t xOff, int32_t yOff ) const
293  { xOff = std::min(std::max(mX + xOff, mStartX),mEndX - 1) - mX; yOff = std::min(std::max( mY + yOff, mStartY ), mEndY - 1) - mY;
294  return *(T*)((uint8_t*)( mPtr + mGreenOff + xOff * mInc ) + yOff * mRowInc); }
296  T& bClamped( int32_t xOff, int32_t yOff ) const
297  { xOff = std::min(std::max(mX + xOff, mStartX),mEndX - 1) - mX; yOff = std::min(std::max( mY + yOff, mStartY ), mEndY - 1) - mY;
298  return *(T*)((uint8_t*)( mPtr + mBlueOff + xOff * mInc ) + yOff * mRowInc); }
300  T& aClamped( int32_t xOff, int32_t yOff ) const
301  { xOff = std::min(std::max(mX + xOff, mStartX),mEndX - 1) - mX; yOff = std::min(std::max( mY + yOff, mStartY ), mEndY - 1) - mY;
302  return *(T*)((uint8_t*)( mPtr + mAlphaOff + xOff * mInc ) + yOff * mRowInc); }
303 
305  const int32_t x() const { return mX; }
307  const int32_t y() const { return mY; }
309  Vec2i getPos() const { return Vec2i( mX, mY ); }
310 
312  bool pixel() {
313  ++mX;
314  mPtr += mInc;
315  return mX < mEndX;
316  }
317 
319  bool line() {
320  ++mY;
321  mLinePtr += mRowInc;
322  mPtr = reinterpret_cast<T*>( mLinePtr );
323  // in order to be at the right place after an initial call to pixel(), we need to back up one pixel
324  mPtr -= mInc;
325  mX = mStartX - 1;
326  return mY < mEndY;
327  }
328 
330  int32_t getWidth() const { return mWidth; }
332  int32_t getHeight() const { return mHeight; }
333 
335  uint8_t mRedOff, mGreenOff, mBlueOff, mAlphaOff, mInc;
336  uint8_t *mLinePtr;
337  T *mPtr;
338  int32_t mRowInc, mWidth, mHeight;
339  int32_t mX, mY, mStartX, mStartY, mEndX, mEndY;
341  };
342 
344  class ConstIter {
345  public:
346  ConstIter( const Iter &iter ) {
347  mRedOff = iter.mRedOff;
348  mGreenOff = iter.mGreenOff;
349  mBlueOff = iter.mBlueOff;
350  mAlphaOff = iter.mAlphaOff;
351  mInc = iter.mInc;
352  mRowInc = iter.mRowInc;
353  mWidth = iter.mWidth;
354  mHeight = iter.mHeight;
355  mLinePtr = iter.mLinePtr;
356  mPtr = iter.mPtr;
357  mStartX = iter.mStartX;
358  mX = iter.mX;
359  mStartY = iter.mStartY;
360  mY = iter.mY;
361  mEndX = iter.mEndX;
362  mEndY = iter.mEndY;
363  }
364 
365  ConstIter( const SurfaceT<T> &SurfaceT, const Area &area )
366  : mRedOff( SurfaceT.getRedOffset() ), mGreenOff( SurfaceT.getGreenOffset() ),
367  mBlueOff( SurfaceT.getBlueOffset() ), mAlphaOff( SurfaceT.getAlphaOffset() ),
368  mInc( SurfaceT.getPixelInc() ), mRowInc( SurfaceT.getRowBytes() )
369  {
370  Area clippedArea( area.getClipBy( SurfaceT.getBounds() ) );
371  mWidth = clippedArea.getWidth();
372  mHeight = clippedArea.getHeight();
373  mLinePtr = reinterpret_cast<const uint8_t*>( SurfaceT.getData( clippedArea.getUL() ) );
374  mPtr = reinterpret_cast<const T*>( mLinePtr );
375  mStartX = mX = clippedArea.getX1();
376  mStartY = mY = clippedArea.getY1();
377  mEndX = clippedArea.getX2();
378  mEndY = clippedArea.getY2();
379  // in order to be at the right place after an initial call to line(), we need to back up one line
380  mY = clippedArea.getY1() - 1;
381  mLinePtr -= mRowInc;
382  }
383 
385  const T& r() const { return mPtr[mRedOff]; }
387  const T& g() const { return mPtr[mGreenOff]; }
389  const T& b() const { return mPtr[mBlueOff]; }
391  const T& a() const { return mPtr[mAlphaOff]; }
392 
394  const T& r( int32_t xOff, int32_t yOff ) const { return mPtr[mRedOff + xOff * mInc + yOff * mRowInc]; }
396  const T& g( int32_t xOff, int32_t yOff ) const { return mPtr[mGreenOff + xOff * mInc + yOff * mRowInc]; }
398  const T& b( int32_t xOff, int32_t yOff ) const { return mPtr[mBlueOff + xOff * mInc + yOff * mRowInc]; }
400  const T& a( int32_t xOff, int32_t yOff ) const { return mPtr[mAlphaOff + xOff * mInc + yOff * mRowInc]; }
401 
403  const T& rClamped( int32_t xOff, int32_t yOff ) const
404  { xOff = std::min(std::max(mX + xOff, mStartX),mEndX - 1) - mX; yOff = std::min(std::max( mY + yOff, mStartY ), mEndY - 1) - mY;
405  return *(T*)((uint8_t*)( mPtr + mRedOff + xOff * mInc ) + yOff * mRowInc); }
407  const T& gClamped( int32_t xOff, int32_t yOff ) const
408  { xOff = std::min(std::max(mX + xOff, mStartX),mEndX - 1) - mX; yOff = std::min(std::max( mY + yOff, mStartY ), mEndY - 1) - mY;
409  return *(T*)((uint8_t*)( mPtr + mGreenOff + xOff * mInc ) + yOff * mRowInc); }
411  const T& bClamped( int32_t xOff, int32_t yOff ) const
412  { xOff = std::min(std::max(mX + xOff, mStartX),mEndX - 1) - mX; yOff = std::min(std::max( mY + yOff, mStartY ), mEndY - 1) - mY;
413  return *(T*)((uint8_t*)( mPtr + mBlueOff + xOff * mInc ) + yOff * mRowInc); }
415  const T& aClamped( int32_t xOff, int32_t yOff ) const
416  { xOff = std::min(std::max(mX + xOff, mStartX),mEndX - 1) - mX; yOff = std::min(std::max( mY + yOff, mStartY ), mEndY - 1) - mY;
417  return *(T*)((uint8_t*)( mPtr + mAlphaOff + xOff * mInc ) + yOff * mRowInc); }
418 
420  const int32_t x() const { return mX; }
422  const int32_t y() const { return mY; }
424  Vec2i getPos() const { return Vec2i( mX, mY ); }
425 
427  bool pixel() {
428  ++mX;
429  mPtr += mInc;
430  return mX < mEndX;
431  }
432 
434  bool line() {
435  ++mY;
436  mLinePtr += mRowInc;
437  mPtr = reinterpret_cast<const T*>( mLinePtr );
438  // in order to be at the right place after an initial call to pixel(), we need to back up one pixel
439  mPtr -= mInc;
440  mX = mStartX - 1;
441  return mY < mEndY;
442  }
443 
445  int32_t getWidth() const { return mWidth; }
447  int32_t getHeight() const { return mHeight; }
448 
450  uint8_t mRedOff, mGreenOff, mBlueOff, mAlphaOff, mInc;
451  const uint8_t *mLinePtr;
452  const T *mPtr;
453  int32_t mRowInc, mWidth, mHeight;
454  int32_t mX, mY, mStartX, mStartY, mEndX, mEndY;
456  };
457 
459  Iter getIter() { return Iter( *this, this->getBounds() ); }
461  Iter getIter( const Area &area ) { return Iter( *this, area ); }
463  ConstIter getIter() const { return ConstIter( *this, this->getBounds() ); }
465  ConstIter getIter( const Area &area ) const { return ConstIter( *this, area ); }
466 };

468 class SurfaceExc : public std::exception {
469  virtual const char* what() const throw() {
470  return "Surface exception";
471  }
472 };
473 
474 class SurfaceConstraintsExc : public SurfaceExc {
475  virtual const char* what() const throw() {
476  return "Surface exception: does not conform to expected SurfaceConstraints";
477  }
478 };
